1. This is the 
destination point 
THE COW FESTIVAL! ->

<- 
2. You have to take here as many passengers 
as indicated on the right number

<- 
3. Cows must be
picked at these 
farms

^ 4. Maybe if you click on this vertex and remove it...
(It can't be removed if the spaceship is 
traveling from / to it!)
5. You can always restart the level by cliking here ->
